Package android.health.pedometer

Interface Summary
DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener This simple interface simply forms a mechanism for DistanceChecker to update external objects as the distance traveled figure changes.
DistanceNotifier.Listener  
StepListener Interface implemented by classes that can handle notifications about steps.
StepService.ICallback  
 

Class Summary
DistanceChecker This class is responsible for abstracting all sensor handling away from the rest of the core pedometer components (ExerciseSession, ExcerciseSessionList, and ExcerciseSessionInfo).
DistanceNotifier Calculates and displays the distance walked.
DistanceService  
ExcerciseSession This class encapsulates the core information about a particular exercise session and obtains the estimated number of calories the user burned during the session.
ExcerciseSessionInfo This class stores the core information about the exercise itself from the exercise session: estimated distance, time taken, method taken to estimate distance, average estimated speed, max estimated speed, minimum estimated speed, etc.
ExcerciseSessionList This class is responsible for storing, managing, and allowing access to the history of all the user's exercise sessions recorded by this session.
PedometerDatabaseAdapter This class strictly handles interaction between the exercise sessions database and the rest of the app, only this class should directly touch the database at any point.
StepDetector Detects steps and notifies all listeners (that implement StepListener).
StepService This class was originally written by Levante Bagi as part of the open source Pedometer app for Android This class has been significantly stripped down and optimized for use in the open source Health Manager app for Android by Joel Botner
